ygData.subject: Re: Practice Research
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/99 9:08:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time, benh@zip.com.au ... combine. ... now I have not done it.  So do not quote me... But I think I hear
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/99 9:08:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time, benh@...
writes:

> Basically I add Bat Wings, Bone Chips, and Lapis Laluli (sp?) to the
> Concordance of Research and hit combine. It says these items do not
combine.
> I have tried it with the quill and paper in my inventory (not that I needed
> them with REAL research).

now I have not done it. So do not quote me...

But I think I hear that for the Practice Research... you need the quill and
paper in the Concordance.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
